```{r}
library(polite)

```

```{r}
request <- request(
  "https://clinicaltrials.gov/api/v2/studies?query.cond=cluster+headache&aggFilters=results%3Awith%2Cstatus%3Acom"
) %>% 
  req_perform()
```

```{r, eval = F}
resp_raw(request)
```

```{r}
json_response <- resp_body_json(request)
```
